text:
@WHO @DrTedros Kindly ask to #China, Atleast they are the responsible for this spread of coronavirus.Their policy is not transparent.Why you have not ask any single question to them????
ASK THEM rather than sending birthday wishes to #FIFA president 
I can say it is:
WUHAN HEALTH ORGANIZATION
